import React from 'react' import { Form, Segment, Table } from 'semantic-ui-react' function SearchStep({ searchText, isLoading, movies, selectedMovie, handleChange, handleSearchMovies, handleTableSelection }) { const movieList = movies ? movies.map(movie => { const active = movie && selectedMovie && movie.imdbId === selectedMovie.imdbId return ( handleTableSelection(movie)}> {movie.imdbId} {movie.title} {movie.director} {movie.year} ) }) : ( ) return (
ImdbID Title Director Year {movieList}
) } export default SearchStep
